poolList.earnTokenIntroduce: GoldeFy was coined from 'Gold' and 'DeFi' but the whole concept was inspired from the movie 'AVATAR'. It is decentralized block-chain based Earn-While-In-Sleep(EWIS) metaverse game where you can buy NFT characters and NFT estate, breed for new NFT character, Character enhancement, mine resources and gems for actual profit.

poolList.earnTokenIntroduce: Retail investors want access to high yielding products found in DeFi space; Stable coins, Yield farming, Staking, any combination of tools available. However, these tools require significant time, effort and expertise to optimally utilize. Most people need an easier solution for their basic financial needs, this is where the DeFiYield App comes to play.
poolList.earnTokenDetailText: DeFiYield is your Gateway to DeFi, thanks to its innovative suite asset management tools and other first-class features offered to users to help them navigate in the space of blockchain which is the most explosively growing, and thus the most risky and confusing market and technology of the recent decades.

poolList.earnTokenIntroduce: MetaFighter is a skill-based Play-to-Earn fighting game that pays players for their combat expertise while capturing the essence of arcade fighting classics like Street Fighter, Virtua Fighter, and Soul Calibur.
poolList.earnTokenDetailText: MetaFighter is a skill-based Play-to-Earn fighting game that pays players for their combat expertise while capturing the essence of arcade fighting classics like Street Fighter, Virtua Fighter, and Soul Calibur.
poolList.vestingSchedule: 7d initial cliff, then 7.5%, then after 45d distr. over 11 months.

poolList.earnTokenIntroduce: Sugar Kingdom is not just a game for those who are blockchain users.But it’s a game that could introduce blockchain to millions of players.
poolList.earnTokenDetailText: Besides enjoying an addictive and immersive gameplay, players are the real owners of the items inside the game, and they are able to exchange them with other players and obtain real, attractive and significant rewards according to their total play time. Later, they can invest these earnings in the different economic systems that coexist within the platform.
poolList.vestingSchedule: 6% at TGE, 4 months cliff, then 12% per month.

poolList.earnTokenIntroduce: FOTA is a Triple-A MOBA Game project (based in Singapore) with a fantasy universe inhabited by many races throughout the universe. In the world of FOTA, NFT Technology is optimized so that users can feel the possibility of owning valuable digital assets during the journey.
poolList.earnTokenDetailText: FOTA is more than just a MOBA game platform, the development team has also introduced economic mechanisms and democracies through the DAO with the vision of turning this Metaverse platform into an ever-more realistic universe through integrating Microsoft Mesh (a Microsoft Corporation branch pioneering in creating the most immersive Metaverse experience).
poolList.vestingSchedule: 10% unlocked 7 days after IDO, then weekly vesting for 12 months (airdrop method).

poolList.earnTokenIntroduce: Our vision is to provide a suite of DeFi utilities for NFTs with Yield farming, and liquidity mining opportunities for NFTs like never before, aligned with our Play 2 Earn Game and Shoeverse Metaverse, and brand collaborations.
poolList.earnTokenDetailText: The genesis holders will have the following benefits and more: + Genesis sNFT holders to be airdropped 1 Racecraft (rNFT)/Car NFT worth 0.2 Eth. + Enter the Shoeverse with wearable digital shoes. + Holders of sNFTs will also earn HIGH APY rewards in $SHOE by staking sNFTs. Our vision is to provide a suite of DeFi utilities for NFTs with Yield farming, and liquidity mining opportunities for NFTs like never before, aligned with our Play 2 Earn Game and Shoeverse Metaverse, and brand collaborations.

poolList.earnTokenIntroduce: MultiversePad A Multichain & Cross-Chain Decentralized All-In-One Platform To Include AMM, Farming, Lending, Launchpad, NFT, and More.
poolList.earnTokenDetailText: The MTVP token is the native asset of the MultiversePad project. It exists primarily as a BEP-20 token on the Binance Blockchain for now, but will be introduced on the Polygon blockchain soon. It is required for:• Transactional activity on the network• As a staking collateral• For staking rewards• For participation in the Launchpad IDOs • Base asset for cross-chain swaps• For lending and prediction purposes MultiversePad platform modules include: • MultiversePad Farming - a unique deflationary farming, which doesn't rely on inflation to reward stakers, but rather takes parts of every transaction as a deposit for the staking rewards pools. A certain part of every transaction is burned too. • MultiversePad Launchpad - an Initial Decentralized Offering (IDO) platform, designed to incubate promising projects and to allow MTVP holders to participate in early stage investment opportunities and with a guaranteed allocation. • Multichain & Cross-Chain universe Supported Ethereum, BSC, Harmony, Polygon, Solana. • Deflationary mechanism 0.4% amount for farmer rewards and 0.1% will be burned. • Launchpad participation Fair-tiered System. • Guaranteed allocation for all tiers.
poolList.vestingSchedule: 25% at listing then unlocked 6% each week

poolList.earnTokenIntroduce: MetaChess is the first 3D multiplayer play-to-earn (P2E) and NFT metaverse chess game.
poolList.earnTokenDetailText: MetaChess is will have a 2D and 3D interface.  The3 unique 3D is called MetaChess Warfront. MetaChess Warfront will feature unique human characters as the chess pieces. These human characters will be sold as NFTs and can be used in  them game. Check  out the trailer here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E1VIPs7nigk. The platform also has play-to-earn (P2E) models that makes it worth players’ time. The 2D version is currently playable. You can either play with AI or play with another user.
poolList.vestingSchedule: 33% at TGE, then daily linear vesting over 3 months

poolList.earnTokenIntroduce: Islandpunk - a NFTs Play to Earn game launched on BSC platform with exciting and outstanding features: Oracle, PVP, Zerogas, Stake to Earn, Wake up to earn, Move to earn and many more interesting events.
poolList.earnTokenDetailText: Islandpunk - a NFTs Play to Earn game launched on BSC platform with exciting and outstanding features: Oracle, PVP, Zerogas, Stake to Earn, Wake up to earn, Move to earn and many more interesting events. Move to earn: Users walk and run to reach a required distance for a period of time while maintaining certain movement speeds to earn rewards + Wakeup to earn: Players wake up at a chosen time to obtain a bonus ticket + Play to earn (Stake to earn): PVE as staking to create a labor-saving experience for our gamers + PVP: Players compete with one another to rank up and earn weekly rewards + Oracle: Every in-game price is fixed by usdt + Zerogas: Our game puts an end to gas fees
poolList.vestingSchedule: 33% on TGE, A one month cliff, 33% /month

poolList.earnTokenIntroduce: inSHAPE, the Ultimate Move to Earn app, is a lifestyle app on the BSC ecosystem with a combination of GameFi elements which aims to solve real problems in the M2E Ecosystem, especially for the users who want/seek rewards based on their exercise time, and also want/seek tokens with improved utility, one that goes beyond the blockchain.
poolList.earnTokenDetailText: inSHAPE was created to solving real problems in the Move to Earn industry and is one step ahead of our competitors because: • In addition to rewarding steps and running, our app also offers SHAPE token specific rewards for 4 other different sports - tennis, basketball, soccer and gym. And we're also preparing to reward 6 other sports: hiking, volleyball, handball, baseball, rugby and table tennis.• We also wanted our tokens to have a certain utility outside the blockchain as well, so products and services outside the blockchain world are available on the inSHAPE App Marketplace. Users can get them at absolutely special prices, thanks to the discount codes purchased exclusively with SHAPE tokens.• Also, our NFT offer is limited to only 1,500 NFTs per sport type. This significantly increases the SHAPE tokens' utility.• Last but not least, another advantage of the inSHAPE App is that our project is based on one digital currency, not two. NFTs can only be purchased, minted, upgraded or repaired with the SHAPE tokens.• Furthermore, the use of a single cryptocurrency means that tokens will be burned faster and this will lead to a further increase of the SHAPE tokens' price.
poolList.vestingSchedule: 10% unlocked at TGE and 90% monthly vesting

poolList.earnTokenIntroduce: Futuristic monopoly project with virtual buildings and land
poolList.earnTokenDetailText: Monopolon is a GameFi project with a dynamic similar to that of the iconic game ‘Monopoly’. Individual NFTs represent players in ‘board’ where they can move around to earn rewards, join guilds, engage other players in battle (PvP), and participate in boss raids and guild wars on a grand scale. Monopolon also has virtual land and infrastructure that players can purchase to build up equity and secure their place in the metaverse.

poolList.earnTokenIntroduce: Futuristic monopoly project with virtual buildings and land
poolList.earnTokenDetailText: Monopolon is a GameFi project with a dynamic similar to that of the iconic game ‘Monopoly’. Individual NFTs represent players in ‘board’ where they can move around to earn rewards, join guilds, engage other players in battle (PvP), and participate in boss raids and guild wars on a grand scale. Monopolon also has virtual land and infrastructure that players can purchase to build up equity and secure their place in the metaverse.

poolList.earnTokenIntroduce: Chirpley is the world’s first automated, peer-to-peer, all-in-one influencer marketplace specifically focussed on nano and micro influencers. Chirpley will provide marketers with the freedom to act fast and effectively, thanks to the possibility of a 1-click marketing bomb.
poolList.earnTokenDetailText: Introduction Influencer marketing is one of the most rapidly growing sectors of the marketing industry. Anyone with access to a platform and a following has the power to influence an audience, which brands are attempting to capitalize. Twitter, Instagram, Snapchat, TikTok, Meta, you name it—we are spending more and more of our lives on social media platforms, making them a lucrative space to drive marketing efforts. Product Chirpley is an independent and fully decentralized marketplace to match brands and businesses with nano (1–5k followers) and micro-influencers (5–50k followers). Brands have been slow to realize that targeting smaller influencers is more lucrative, as their engagement level is almost 600% higher than for big influencers—Chirpley allows exactly this by giving both brands and influencers free access to its platform to connect. Problem For brands and businesses, running influencer campaigns manually is extremely time-consuming and inefficient. Furthermore, it is difficult for brands and businesses to understand how much they should pay influencers to promote their products and services. For nano and micro-influencers, way less opportunities exist than for big and well-known influencers. Further, smaller influencers often get compensated in companies’ goods and services, rather than cash. Solution Chirpley is the world’s first decentralized peer-to-peer influencer marketplace. A decentralized ecosystem powered by artificial intelligence and machine learning, which matches nano and micro-influencers with brands. Chirpley’s algorithm then calculates a fair price for a range of services from tweets, retweets, likes, video posts, etc. based on an influencer’s amount of impressions and engagement. This automated setup allows brands to leverage many smaller influencers easily and effortlessly with complete cost transparency, while creating earning opportunities for the influencers at the same time. Chirpley gives social media users the unique opportunity to monetize their social influence in an easy and transparent way by sharing content with their friends and followers. Token Utility Value 1. The brand can make the payment in any currency, whether fiat or crypto. Because of the swapping mechanism in the underlying layer, any currency would be converted to $CHRP in the backend. Due to which, the influencer gets paid only in $CHRP, which increases the sustainability of the token. 2. 20% gross margin is taken on each transaction out of which 1/5th is sent to a burn address directly. 3. Chirpley has set aside 15 percent of tokenomics for marketing purposes. A tiny percentage will be distributed every day and vested over a five-year period. Influencers will be paid in $CHRP automatically to promote the Chirpley platform and token, ensuring a steady supply of promotion for the platform and token. Also, will also unlock the future, fully automated and decentralized self sustaining platform. 4. Passive rewards through Staking. Influencers can choose to lock the $CHRP token for 30-60-90-120 etc days on platform. Even in the case the token drops in value, they still get the passive rewards. Further, this creates the mechanism to hold and not panic sell, in case the value of the token drops, if ever. 5. Staking also gives the holders voting power when Chirpley moves onto a DAO model in future, as the token of governance. Holders can make decisions on various releases and further rewards like NFTs etc.
poolList.vestingSchedule: 15% Released at TGE, then monthly over 6 months

Further, this creates the mechanism to hold and not panic sell, in case the value of the token drops, if ever. 5. Staking also gives the holders voting power when Chirpley moves onto a DAO model in future, as the token of governance. Holders can make decisions on various releases and further rewards like NFTs etc.
poolList.vestingSchedule: 15% Released at TGE, then monthly over 6 months

poolList.earnTokenIntroduce: BlocKombat is a P2E (play to earn) 3D multichain, GameFi ecosystem with NFTs rewards with the aim of revolutionizing the GameFi industry and further drive the adoption of crypto and play to earn in the gaming industry.
poolList.earnTokenDetailText: BlocKombat is a game based on the exciting idea of fighting different heroes. The best players receive NFT rewards and real income. The BlocKombat tournaments will help form a real league of loyal players. Based on NFT technology, BlocKombat is not just an exciting game, but a whole platform that allows users to trade not only game items and characters, but also their skills. BlocKombat is developed for both mobile devices and PC and provides interoperability with multiple blockchains such as BSC, CSC, OKC, etc. The project’s tokenomics is sustainable and relies on the BKB token, which is the main ecosystem incentive and also allows participation in the project’s DAO. Among the project partners are such big names as OKex Smart Chain, CoinEx Smart Chain, Solana Nation, BNB Nation, Polkawar, etc..

poolList.earnTokenIntroduce: BMN is a DAO governed Metaverse gaming platform, consisting of the $BMC revenue sharing governance token, NFT dApp ecosystem, Game Studio, Marketplace, DEX Aggregrator, Launchpad and Wallet.
poolList.earnTokenDetailText: Traditional gaming companies are profit driven, focused on products revolved around microtransactions, loot boxes, and other methods. At BMN, our mission is to revitalize the industry to provide our users with innovative experiences, in which users can own and monetize their in-game assets.

poolList.earnTokenIntroduce: SLEEP is the first Web3 lifestyle app with Social-Fi and Game-Fi elements where users can earn $ZZZ for sleeping, relaxing and putting their phone away. At launch, users equipped with NFT beds - sleep to earn $SLEEP, which can be used to level up and mint new beds and other equipment. Players can choose to rent or sell their NFT beds on the in-app Marketplace; users’ SLEEP earnings are stored in the in-app Wallet, which has a built-in Swap function.  Game-Fi modes Sleeping: Lock your phone in Sleep mode and earn $ZZZ Drive: Lock your phone while driving the car and earn $ZZZ Mental health and rest: Lock your phone during the day and earn $ZZZ 🪙 Token Utility The $SLEEP token is used as the main project token within the ecosystem, it will be used for: governance and minting the first NFT to get started in-game. $SLEEP will be accompanied by a secondary token $ZZZ, which is used to perform major actions in the game: earn $ZZZ by locking their phone in one of the game modes, level up, buy accessories for NFTs, repair NFTs.

poolList.earnTokenIntroduce: The New NFTs On The Block Fragminted Digital Artworks Fragmint offers a revolutionary way of creating, minting, and auctioning digital art into smaller stand-alone NFTs.
poolList.earnTokenDetailText: FRAGMINT | Powered by Evedo.co - Fragmentable NFTs with formable DAOs 🧩 =========== Fragmint is a one-stop solution for celebrities, festivals, and big franchises to launch and do NFT drops, capitalizing on their fandom. 🤩 Fragmint enables high-end art piece fragmentation for mass-market accessibility and the creation of a sub-economy. 🧩 Fragmint introduces a general governance voting system that allows the power users to vote for different decisions related to further platform development and upcoming auctions. 🧙 Fragmint gives DAO structure available for the owners of the different valuable NFTs generated during the different auctions. 🤝 All the FRAG Tokens will be used on Fragmint marketplace (limited supply, staking & burning mechanisms). ⚙️ Fragmint will be used by: 🔸 Celebrities from any industry 🔸 Large Scale Event Organizers 🔸 Global Scale Promoters 🔸 Major Film & TV Production Houses

poolList.earnTokenIntroduce: ⚽ $PARMA is Fan token of legendary Parma Calcio 1913, a football team with a great history. Winner of: 🏆3 Italian Cups 🏆1 Italian Super Cup 🏆2 UEFA Cups 🏆1 UEFA Super Cup $PARMA Fan token is a cryptocurrency with the aim of revolutionizing fan engagement through innovative and exclusive experiences. Holders will also be able to participate in surveys, win match tickets and make important choices about their team. Highlights: 🔥 Sports club with over 100 years of history 🔥 Hundreds of thousands of fans worldwide 🔥 Launched by the CoinOfChampions team 🔥 Parma Calcio legends will support the project.
